snippet: An informer’s tip led police to a private cemetery in Port Elizabeth where they found four paintings hundreds of miles from the Pretoria Art Museum.
abstract: Informer's tip leads South African police to private cemetery in Port Elizabeth where four paintings stolen from Pretoria Art Museum are hidden; one painting has not been found.
lead_paragraph: An informer’s tip led police to a private cemetery in Port Elizabeth where they found four paintings hundreds of miles from the Pretoria Art Museum.

headline.main: South Africa: Stolen Paintings Believed to Be Found
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Stolen Paintings Believed to Be Found
